topic.title: Blocked IP Address
topic.shortdesc: The PBX will block an IP address for too many failed login attempts, too many failed registration attempts, or too many failed authentications for Auto Provisioning.

body.p: The blocked IP addresses would be listed in the Blocked IP Address table. If a trusted IP address was blocked by the PBX, you can go to Settings System Security IP Auto Defense Blocked IP Address to delete the IP address.
